original_text: The coming of the lawless one will be in accordance with how Satan works. He will use all sorts of displays of power through signs and wonders that serve the lie,
korean_text: 악한 자의 나타남은 사탄의 활동을 따라 모든 능력과 표적과 거짓 기적과

sentences.original_text: The coming of the lawless one
will be in accordance with how Satan works
He will use all sorts of displays of power
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 온갖 능력의 나타남을 사용할 것이니
